themes: adherence to legal requirements for HOT funds
key_phrases: They should follow the state statue for HOT funds
program expectations have become beyond the core function
Commissioners should not be allowed to vote and info the guidelines and then receive the funding
barriers_identified: program expectations exceeding funding source's core function
potential conflicts of interest with commissioners
solutions_proposed: Follow the state statute for HOT funds
Limit program expectations to the core function of the funding source
Prohibit commissioners from voting on guidelines and receiving funding
